trans-unit.source: Stores an ordered pair of floating-point numbers, typically the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Archivia una coppia ordinata di numeri a virgola mobile, in genere la larghezza e altezza di un rettangolo.

trans-unit.source: The unit for a SizeF structure depends on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
trans-unit.target: L'unità di una struttura SizeF dipende il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A>le impostazioni per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto utilizzato per disegnare.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A>
